verses.roman:
dine nānā krīḍā kare lañā bhakta-gaṇa
rātrye kṛṣṇa-vicchede prabhu karena rodana

synonyms: dine—during the day; nānā—various; krīḍā kare—performed pastimes; lañā bhakta-gaṇa—with His devotees; rātrye—at night; kṛṣṇa-vicchede—because of separation from Kṛṣṇa; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena rodana—cries.
translation: During the day, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu engaged in various activities with His devotees, but at night He felt great separation from Kṛṣṇa and used to cry.
